trans-unit.source: Provides the <see langword="abstract" /> base class for implementing a license provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see langword="abstract" /> 基底類別，以便實作授權提供者。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a licensed control using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立授權的控制項使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseManager.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It uses a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> that is implemented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider> class.

When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />, you must override the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />，您必須覆寫<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider" /> for an implementation of this class.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider" />這個類別的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關授權的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 授權元件和控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext" /> that specifies where you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext" />，指定您可以使用授權物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the component requesting the license.
An object that is requesting the license.
<see langword="true" /> if a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException" /> should be thrown when the component cannot be granted a license; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件無法取得授權時應該擲回 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseException" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a license for an instance or type of component, when given a context and whether the denial of a license throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不論授權的拒絕是否擲回例外狀況，在提供內容時，如果在衍生類別中覆寫，則取得元件的執行個體或型別的授權。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />, you must override <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)" /> to implement a validation method for the license key.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />，您必須覆寫<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)" />來實作授權金鑰的驗證方法。
